name: Educational Kids Musical Games
description:
Monster Band is a musical game for children. This game is fun and simple to use. It will encourage your children to explore music in a new and creative way by helping a band of friendly monsters to prepare their concert. The child can compose their own rhythm by creating fun songs of different musical genres through experimenting with different beats and instruments as well.

Overall, children of all ages can enjoy learning mixing sounds and composing songs with the help of a musical monster band.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
▶DIFFERENT MUSIC STYLES

Your child will certainly have fun with the different characters in the game, each one with their own sound and musical rhythm to play instruments on stage.
They will discover new music combinations and explore different styles: Techno, Country, Funk and Afrobeat.

Techno: Our friends have filled the dance floor with fresh electronic, dance beats.

Afrobeat: There is nothing better than to join a reggae music concert on the beach to brighten your day.

Country: The unmistakable sound of The Far, Far West. The Monster Band has put some overalls and cowboy hats to create a true country-filled concert surrounded by giant cactuses.

Funk: A blast to the past where the dance floor is welcomed by familiar, retro sounds that most can enjoy playing as you go along with the beat of the songs!

▶ LITTLE COMPOSERS
Your child may choose to compose their own rhythms under the "Composer" game mode and have the choice to set the speed of pace they prefer.
-The child will explore different kinds of music as they play to become talented DJs or musicians.

▶ MUSICAL INSTRUMENT SOUNDS
-Choose from the instruments given and mix sounds to create rhythms and beats.
Listen to how the different kinds of musical instruments sound: piano, organ, drums, bass, guitar, bells, etc... You’ll come across a delightful set of instruments that completes an orchestra!

▶ GAME FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY
With Monster Band you can play with your children and experience songs and rhythms in fun and different ways. Show your creative side and help create countless songs. We are certain that there is more than one good composer at home!
